summary: The file defines a combined pipeline for Kandinsky 2.2 that integrates multiple components (prior, UNet, VQ decoder, CLIP models) to support text‑to‑image, image‑to‑image, and inpainting generation tasks. It provides methods for initializing the pipeline, configuring schedulers, handling off‑loading and memory‑efficient attention, and exposing a unified `__call__` interface for generation.
business_intent: Provides a flexible, all‑in‑one solution for generating high‑quality images from text prompts or existing images, enabling developers and content creators to build applications such as art generation, visual prototyping, marketing material creation, and creative assistance tools.
